ValidationRule.description: Selling Assortment Filter on Order Template can't be activated if the Customer Selling Assortment isn't activated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( cgcloud__Customer_Selling_Assortment__c = false, cgcloud__Selling_Assortment_Filter__c = true), true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Selling Assortment Filter on Order Template can't be activated if the Customer Selling Assortment isn't activated.
